701431f-b.title: Bronx: Marion Avenue - Fordham Road
701431f-b.text:
and (2).
2559 Marion Avenue, west side, between E. Fordham Road
and E. 193rd Street. A 7-story apartment house replaced
this frame dwelling in 1938. The two views were taken the
same day.
May 24, 1936
P.L.Sperr
NO REPRODUCTIONS
701431f-b.folder: Marion Avenue & Fordham Road, Bronx, NY

701432f-a.title: Bronx: Marion Avenue - Fordham Road
701432f-a.text:
2559 and 2561-69 Marion Avenue, west side, between E. Fordham
Road and E. 193rd Street, adjoining the Fordham branch of the New
York Public Library. The new building, No. 2559, occupies the site
of an old frame dwelling. fhe view is north.
June 16, 1938
P. L. Sperr
NO REPRODUCTIONS
